name: Sleep!
subtitle: Rocket's Secret Machine

historicalClassification.note: Originally printed as a Trainer. Would be classified as Item by modern rules. Part of the 'Rocket's Secret Machine' series.

effect.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pok√©mon is now Asleep.

synergies: Decks that benefit from opponent being unable to attack
tips: 50% chance to put opponent's Active Pokemon to Sleep
Sleep can be flipped out of between turns

competitiveHistory: Sleep! was one of the Rocket's Secret Machine cards featuring quirky, gadget-themed artwork. While the effect was potentially useful for stalling, the coin flip requirement and the fact that Sleep could be cured between turns made it unreliable in competitive play. The artwork featured Vileplume-inspired sleep machines and a sleeping Snorlax.

rulings.ruling: If you flip tails, nothing happens.
The Defending Pokemon flips to wake up between turns as normal for the Asleep condition.
